 The bible describes God in many ways. . . How many of these do you believe represents God?
 
 We can't tell a kid where God came from but with the bible we can tell him what God is like.

 Can all be right? Can all be wrong?

 These are some of the obvious problems with worshiping the God of the bible. I would like to hear your reactions. . . . . . . If you want sources, google them.. . they're there.
